mapper.insert: insert into userinfo (id, pw, email, age, name, grade ) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{age}, #{name}, 1 )
mapper.select: select count(id) from userinfo where id = #{id}
select id, pw, email, age, name, date_format(time, '%y.%m.%d') as time, grade from userinfo order by time desc;
select id, pw, email, age, name, date_format(time, '%y.%m.%d') as time, grade from userinfo where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw} and delete_yn = 0
